meanings.definition: A person who advocates for the assimilation of minority groups into the dominant culture.
meanings.sent1: The assimilationists in our community work hard to help newcomers adapt to our way of life.
meanings.sent2: The assimilationists believe that blending in with the dominant culture is beneficial for everyone.
meanings.sent3: The assimilationists organized a cultural exchange event to promote unity and understanding.
meanings.sent4: In the melting pot of society, the assimilationists are the chefs mixing all the ingredients together.
meanings.sent5: The assimilationists strive to create a harmonious blend of traditions and values.

meanings.definition: Those who believe in the process of assimilation.
meanings.sent1: Many assimilationists support the idea of integrating different customs into a unified whole.
meanings.sent2: The assimilationists see assimilation as a natural progression towards unity.
meanings.sent3: At the costume party, the assimilationists dressed up as a mix of various cultural symbols.
meanings.sent4: Like puzzle pieces fitting together, the assimilationists see different cultures merging seamlessly.
meanings.sent5: The assimilationists view diversity as a beautiful mosaic waiting to be assembled.
